t:
As I was walking down the road yesterday, I saw a man frantically running out of a house.

He told me that he was kidnapped, blindfolded and locked in the basement for months.


You should have seen the look on his face when he recognized my voice.
c:
I couldn't post yesterday cause I was dealing with that escaped prisoner.



#man #run #house #kidnap #escape #fail #badluck #voice
